story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful land of Indonesia, there lived a young boy named Budi. Budi was adventurous and curious, always seeking to explore the wonders of his island home.

One night, as Budi lay in bed, ready to drift off to sleep, the stars twinkled brightly outside his window. Suddenly, a shooting star streaked across the night sky, and Budi's eyes widened in amazement. He made a wish with all his heart - to have an exciting adventure that would bring joy to his family and his community.

The next morning, Budi set out on his journey, walking through lush forests and crossing crystal-clear streams. Along the way, he met friendly animals like mischievous monkeys and colorful birds, who guided him on his path.

As the sun began to set, Budi found himself at the foot of a towering volcano. Determined to reach the top, he summoned all his courage and began to climb. The journey was tough, with rocks and ash blocking his way, but Budi never gave up.

Finally, after hours of climbing, Budi reached the summit as the first rays of dawn painted the sky in hues of pink and orange. From the top, he could see the entire island spread out below him, bathed in the golden light of morning.

With a joyful heart, Budi knew that his wish had come true. He had embarked on a grand adventure, faced challenges with determination, and experienced the beauty of nature in all its glory. As he descended the volcano, he felt a sense of pride and contentment.

That night, as Budi drifted off to sleep, he knew that no matter where his adventures took him, he would always carry the spirit of courage and kindness in his heart. And as he dreamed, the stars above whispered their approval, shining brightly in the night sky.

The end. Goodnight, dear Budi. Dream big and never stop exploring the wonders of the world around you.
